ch.ethz.inspire.emod.model.math

Class Sum

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.ethz.inspire.emod.model.APhysicalComponent
      • ch.ethz.inspire.emod.model.math.Sum

  • public class Sum
extends APhysicalComponent
    General Sum of inputs class Assumptions: Inputlist: 1: Plus : [var] : Counted positive 2: Minus : [var] : Counted negative Outputlist: 1: Sum : [var] : Calculated sum Config parameters: Unit : [string] : Unit of the sum block
    Author:
    simon
